attributes.action: Erect a public memorial to Satan the rottweiller
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To enable his friends, and dog-lovers everywhere, to express their sorrow in his tragic death, aged just 1 year.

We ask the Prime Minister to erect a statue to him, on the 4th plynth in Trafalgar Square, so that the National grief and outrage at his senseless death can be properly shown with flowers, bouquets of Bonios and candle-lit vigils demanding that the slaughter must stop.

This is no more than he, or we as the Great British Emotionally-liberated Public, deserve.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
